title: Tools for tree point clouds
text:
Data management

Tools for Lidar Point Cloud Management


Name
author/institution
language
description




pytreedb
3DGeo Research Group of Heidelberg University and the Institute of Geography and Geoecology (IFGG) of Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT).
python + REST
pytreedb is a file- and object-based database for managing laser scanning and inventory data of single trees.




pytreedb

manage data: Trees are imported from GeoJSON files which contain information on tree location, species, and tree properties, and link to one or multiple point clouds. These single tree 3D datasets may be extracted from airborne, UAV-borne or terrestrial laser scanning data.
pytreedb allows filtering the data, e.g., by location, tree properties, linked data types or acquisition dates.
The database may be used to populate synthetic forest stands of given species composition and stand density for laser scanning simulations or radiative transfer models.




Data processing
